text: Apogee Therapeutics reports positive Phase 2 results for atopic dermatitis drug. Apogee Therapeutics (NASDAQ:APGE) shares fell almost 15% despite the release of positive Phase 2 APEX trial results for APG777, its anti-IL-13 antibody for moderate-to-severe atopic dermatitis. The trial met its primary endpoint with a 71% reduction in Eczema Area Severity Index (EASI) score at Week 16, versus 33.8% for placebo.
label: neutral

text: CoreWeave to acquire Core Scientific for $9B in all-stock deal. CoreWeave (NASDAQ:CRWV), an AI hyperscaler, announced that it will acquire data center infrastructure provider Core Scientific (NASDAQ:CORZ) in an all-stock deal valued at approximately $9 billion. Shares of both companies fell on the announcement, with CoreWeave down 2.3% at $161 and Core Scientific down 15.9% at $15.
